channel.title: Navan Badminton Club
channel.description: Welcome to Navan Badminton Club located at Claremont Stadium in Navan, Co. Meath, Ireland. Club nights every Monday and Wednesday during the season which runs from September to April. Club caters for Adults and Juveniles of all standards from beginner to advanced.
channel.item: https://navanbadmintonclub.com/news/2024-08-28-countdown-new-season-begins ðŸš€ Countdown Alert!! new season begins in 12 Days https://navanbadmintonclub.com/news/2024-08-28-countdown-new-season-begins undefined Wed, 28 Aug 2024 00:00:00 GMT badminton@navanbadmintonclub.com (Navan Badminton Club) Shuttlecock2024/25 SeasonLaunch DatesSports
